text: ane tame temane nuha (a.Sa.)No kis'so vanci sambhalavo, jyare temane potani komane kahyum, ke he mari komana loko! Jo tamane marum ahinya rahevum ane allahana adesoni sikhamana apavi kathina lagatum hoya, to maro bharoso allaha para ja che, tame potani yukti potana bhagidaro sathe majabuta kari lo, pachi tamari cala tamara khandananum karana na banavi jo'i'e, pachi mari sathe je karavum hoya kari lo mane mahetala na apo
